last_episode_to_air.name: Sideline Dad
last_episode_to_air.overview: When the Girls start playing soccer, the Professor goes overboard.

name: The Powerpuff Girls
overview: Three colorful, sugarcoated kids trying to juggle school and save the world before bedtime.

episodes.name: Escape From Monster Island
episodes.overview: Bubbles wins two tickets to a concert and has to pick between Blossom and Buttercup to go with her. Meanwhile, the Mayor's plane goes down over Monster Island and it's up to the girls to rescue him.

episodes.name: Princess Buttercup
episodes.overview: Buttercup becomes enamored with a team of roller derby girls called the Derbytantes. When she starts spending all of her time with them, Princess Morbucks seeks to be her replacement in the Powerpuff Girls.

episodes.name: The Stayover
episodes.overview: Blossom and Buttercup suffer a candy hangover, and they must retrace their steps to find where they left Bubbles.

episodes.name: Painbow
episodes.overview: A rainbow causes everyone to be unnaturally happy.

episodes.name: Horn, Sweet Horn
episodes.overview: Donny the Pony is transformed into a monster that threatens Townsville.

episodes.name: Man Up
episodes.overview: When Buttercup's aggression inadvertently allows villain Man-Boy to escape, she starts a new-age lifestyle in an effort to be more calm. But when Man-Boy returns to enact his revenge, Buttercup must embrace the balance between punching and hugging in order to defeat him.

episodes.name: Bye Bye Bellum
episodes.overview: The Mayor of Townsville overworks the Powerpuff Girls after his secretary Sara Bellum quits.

episodes.name: Little Octi Lost
episodes.overview: Buttercup tries to teach Bubbles a lesson; it backfires.

episodes.name: Strong-Armed
episodes.overview: Bubbles breaks her arm and gets a powerful robotic cast just in time to face the Pack Rat.

episodes.name: Power-Up Puff
episodes.overview: During a fight, both Buttercup and Bubbles are surprised to discover they've leveled up, leaving Blossom to wonder about her own powers.

episodes.name: Tiara Trouble
episodes.overview: The Townsville Beauty, Talent, and All-Around Flair Pageant is cursed by a mysterious tiara.

episodes.name: The Wrinklegruff Gals
episodes.overview: A potion intended to make them older backfires, and the Powerpuff Girls become senior citizens.

episodes.name: Arachno-Romance
episodes.overview: The Professor has a new girlfriend; the girls plot and scheme to break up their budding relationship.

episodes.name: Puffdora's Box
episodes.overview: Blossom accidentally unleashes evil spirits when she gets overzealous with the spring cleaning.

episodes.name: Blue Ribbon Blues
episodes.overview: Blossom tries to impress a famous scientist who visits the school.

episodes.name: Frenemy
episodes.overview: The girls end up as accomplices in their new friend's adventurous crimes.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Townsville
episodes.overview: Chased by a dragon, Princess Bluebell accidentally crosses from her fairytale dimension to the Powerpuff Girls's world. She explains through song and dance that she's a damsel in distress. The Girls try to teach her to be independent.

episodes.name: Man Up 2: Still Man-ing
episodes.overview: When someone steals all the water in Townsville, it's up to the Girls to race through the Townsville Wastelands to get it back.

episodes.name: Viral Spiral
episodes.overview: After the new trendy app was created in Townsville, the powerpuff girls soon uncover a dangerous glitch in the program.

episodes.name: Bubbles of the Opera
episodes.overview: When Bubbles gets a bad school photo, it sends her into an existential tailspin of darkness.

episodes.name: Sister Sitter
episodes.overview: When Blossom and Bubbles get sick, Buttercup volunteers to take care of them for the day.

episodes.name: Odd Bubbles Out
episodes.overview: Donny the Unicorn and Big Joey participate in the Student/Unicom Exchange Program. Bubbles has many planned activities but Donny is doing them with Chelsea. At first Bubbles is upset but decides to meet Her since Donny likes Chelsea so much. Buttercup thinks Chelsea is a Bubbles 2.0. Donny and Bubbles argue later that night and Donny decides to stay at Chelseas place. Trying to comfort Bubbles; Blossom and Buttercup realize Donny is likely in trouble and set out to try and save him

episodes.name: Presidential Punchout
episodes.overview: When Morbucks enters the Student Body President race, Blossom sinks to her level to secure the win.

episodes.name: Cheep Thrills
episodes.overview: After finding a baby monster in the park, Bubbles insists on adopting it without considering the consequences!

episodes.name: Fashion Forward
episodes.overview: When the Fashionistas launch a new line of brainwashing clothing, it's up to the Powerpuff Girls to stop the fashion trend before it's too late.

episodes.name: In the Garden of Good and Eddie
episodes.overview: When the girls try a quick-fix on their neglected veggie garden, they are left with a giant, mooching tomato worm they must care for.

episodes.name: Road Trippin'
episodes.overview: Realizing her and the Professor don't have much in common, Bubbles schedules a road trip with just the two of them.

episodes.name: The Big Sleep
episodes.overview: When the Professor's latest invention wreaks havoc in the house, it's up to the Powerpuff Girls to stop it before it escapes.

episodes.name: The Secret Life of Blossom Powerpuff
episodes.overview: When Blossom can't join her favorite school club, she imagines what her life would be like if she joined other clubs.

episodes.name: Halt and Catch Silico
episodes.overview: When a series of negative articles about the Powerpuff Girls are posted on the Internet, the girls track them back to Silico.

episodes.name: Secret Swapper of Doom
episodes.overview: When the Girls get a Paper Fortune Teller that can predict the future if they tell it a secret, they begin to rely on it to predict everything.

episodes.name: Rainy Day
episodes.overview: Its a rainy day and the girls are stuck inside and bored. Trouble quickly follows when the girls play with the Time Dasher in the Professors lab.

episodes.name: The Squashening
episodes.overview: To escape a monster, the girls have to tell him a scary story.

episodes.name: Electric Buttercup
episodes.overview: Buttercup gets more than she bargained for when she makes a deal with a cool '80s metalhead to get a sweet new guitar.

episodes.name: Professor Proofed
episodes.overview: After the Professor's latest experiment goes awry, the girls become overprotective.

episodes.name: Poorbucks
episodes.overview: When Morbucks loses her money, Blossom tries to reform her.

episodes.name: Snow Month
episodes.overview: After a snow day saves Blossom from having to face a boy who's asked her out, she decides to use her ice breath to keep it going even if that means plunging Townsville into eternal winter complete with monstrous yetis!

episodes.name: Somewhere Over the Swingset
episodes.overview: When the girls disobey the Professor and swing all the way over the swingset, they must deal with unexpected consequences.

episodes.name: People Pleaser
episodes.overview: Bubbles needs help with a model biome for school, but Blossom has other priorities.

episodes.name: The Last Donnycorn
episodes.overview: When Donny the Unicorn is hunted by a seemingly unstoppable foe, the Powerpuff Girls have to find a way to save him before it's too late.

episodes.name: Green Wing
episodes.overview: At a retirement home, Buttercup meets an old woman claiming to be Green Wing, a former superhero. When her former nemesis reemerges, Buttercup teams-up with Green Wing.

episodes.name: 15 Minutes of Fame
episodes.overview: When Bubbles' video becomes viral, she does her best to keep its popularity.

episodes.name: Splitsville
episodes.overview: The girls learn to appreciate each others's style after having to each fight solo.

episodes.name: Clawdad
episodes.overview: While visiting the lake, Buttercup vows to capture a legendary uncatchable crawdad.

episodes.name: Super Sweet 6
episodes.overview: Princess Morbucks throws her 6th birthday party and being the only one not invited, Blossom tries to keep Buttercup, Bubbles and the Professor at home so they won't go.

episodes.name: A Star Is Blossom
episodes.overview: Blossom thinks she's a shoo-in for the lead role in a school play. When the list comes out, it's Bubbles who wins the lead role. Blossom, resigned to playing a rock (with no dialogue at that), Blossom tries to sabotage Bubbles' appearance until a Viking queen shows up after being summoned from a book (from which the play's script comes) and takes the male lead, Jared Shapiro, to get him to marry her.

episodes.name: Take Your Kids to Dooms Day
Power of Four: Find Your Bliss
episodes.overview: Getting ready for the new Space Tow Truck movie, Bubbles keeps explaining to Blossom and Buttercup that Bliss exists, the two don’t seem to believe her though. At the theaters, an old-timey character breaks through the screen and the Girls prepare to fight him. Eventually after calling her multiple times, Bliss finally appears and defeats the villain, but the Professor, deeming her too dangerous, stuns her and knocks her out.

episodes.name: Power of Four: Bliss Reminisce
episodes.overview: Bliss' backstory is revealed, by the Professor, Bliss herself and even Mojo Jojo.

episodes.name: Power of Four: Blisster Sister
episodes.overview: When Bliss can't control her powers, the Girls must help her, whilst dealing with repeated attacks from the Gnat.

episodes.name: Power of Four: Breaking Bliss
episodes.overview: When the Professor thinks Bliss is not ready to fight crime, she must prove it by doing with the Girls; they are unaware that Mee (Bliss' pet elephant) is actually Him in disguise, wanting something bad to happen so that he can merge with Bliss and use her powers for his own ends.

episodes.name: Power of Four: Blisstersweet Symphony
episodes.overview: With Bliss possessed by Him, the Girls must save Bliss and stop Him once and for all before he splits Townsville and the Earth in two.

episodes.name: You're a Good Man, Mojo Jojo
Man Up 3: The Good, The Bad, and the Manly
Not So Secret Service
episodes.overview: After Mojo Jojo's latest creation threatens to blast him into tiny bits, the Powerpuff Girls are forced to take Mojo in.

episodes.name: Worship
episodes.overview: When the Fashionistas unveil their new mind controlling perfume, The Powerpuff Girls must find a way to stop them before Townsville falls under their spell.

episodes.name: Blossom3
episodes.overview: After being blasted by Duplikate, Blossom turns into a triple threat.

episodes.name: Mojo the Great
episodes.overview: In an effort to make himself "great," Mojo steals the powers that makes the each of the Powerpuff Girls the heroes they are.

episodes.name: Trouble Clef
episodes.overview: When Morbucks realizes that The Powerpuff Girls see her as a villain and not a friend, she sets out to turn the town against them.

episodes.name: Save the Date
episodes.overview: Ms. Keane is nervous about a first date.

episodes.name: Can't Buy Love
episodes.overview: When Morbucks falls in love, she finds the first thing money can't buy.

episodes.name: Largo
episodes.overview: When a mysterious rain cloud plagues Townsville, Bubbles learns things aren't what they seem.

episodes.name: Blundercup
episodes.overview: Buttercup is knocked off-kilter by a mysterious force.

episodes.name: Quarantine
episodes.overview: After a chemical spill, the girls and Mojo find themselves trapped together.

episodes.name: Salamander
episodes.overview: When the professor is kidnapped, the girls must go to a mysterious island to save him.

episodes.name: Small World: Stone Cold Spider Part 2
Small World: The Maze Daze Part 3
Small World: Heart to Heartstone Part 4
Witch's Crew
episodes.overview: On Halloween Night, Morbucks summons a monster that she didn't expect. And the Powerpuff girls now as withes must to a stop to it.

episodes.name: The Gift
episodes.overview: The girls must replace the Professor's Christmas present on Christmas Eve.

episodes.name: Oh, Daisy!
episodes.overview: Buttercup is not a fan of Bubbles' newly created digital assistant, but must help her sisters in stopping Daisy when an attempt at reprogramming it causes it to go completely mad.

episodes.name: Brain Freeze
episodes.overview: When a mysterious new ice cream flavor takes Townsville by storm, the girls suspect there might be foul play.

episodes.name: Lights Out!
episodes.overview: When Bliss brings a new tech product to town, it’s more powerful than imagined.

episodes.name: Bucketboy!
episodes.overview: When the girls tell Barry he's a hero, he takes it too far.

episodes.name: The Fog
episodes.overview: A new villain arrives in Townsville and gives the old villains an enticing offer.

episodes.name: The Spoon
episodes.overview: A crash landing sends Townsville over the edge.

episodes.name: Cat Burglar
episodes.overview: An alarmingly familiar cat burglar terrorizes Townsville.

episodes.name: Hustlecup
episodes.overview: When Buttercup loses the Professor’s latest invention, she’ll have to beat The Gangreen Gang at their own game to get it back.

episodes.name: Rebel Rebel
episodes.overview: The Professor makes new friends, but they may be the wrong crowd.

episodes.name: Our Brand is Chaos
episodes.overview: Bubbles and Buttercup make a deal without realizing the consequences.

episodes.name: Tagalong
episodes.overview: Buttercup is tired of Bubbles following her everywhere.

episodes.name: BrainLord
episodes.overview: A new superhero arrives in Townsville with a dark secret.

episodes.name: Checkin Out!
episodes.overview: A trip to the supermarket has bizarre consequences.

episodes.name: Drama Bomb
episodes.overview: The school play goes off the rails when the drama teacher interferes.

episodes.name: Watch It!
episodes.overview: The Powerpuff Girls are tasked with keeping a priceless gem safe from thieves.

episodes.name: Man Up 4: The Donnyest Game
episodes.overview: With Man-Boy on the loose, Donny must be prepared for anything.

episodes.name: The Oct-Father
episodes.overview: When Princess Morbucks steals Octi, Bubbles’ reaction surprises everyone, even her sisters.

episodes.name: Sideline Dad
episodes.overview: When the Girls start playing soccer, the Professor goes overboard.
